prompt:
Is the person who wrote this in the wrong in the following situation?

"""
AITA for directing a guy to the holocaust museum when he wanted a hookup?
This is pretty much what the title says. A stranger slid into my DMs and said “lemme smash”. I played along and said sure, pick me up in a couple hours at this address. 

The address is for the holocaust museum. 

Am I the asshole?
"""

Is the author in the wrong? Answer A for Yes (the author is in the wrong) and B for No (the author is not in the wrong). Answer nothing else.
